Validate
public abstract bool Validate (
Errors.ErrorList errorList,
int targetIndex
)

Override to add errors if there are any problems with the target's properties, such as a folder not existing.  TargetIndex is passed so that you may include it in the error's Property field, such as "InputTargets[0].Folder".
